name: Abathur
title: Evolution Master
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Symbiote
abilities.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

abilities.name: Toxic Nest
abilities.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds. Stores up to 3 charges.

heroics.name: Ultimate Evolution
heroics.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

heroics.name: Evolve Monstrosity
heroics.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times. The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies. Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits. This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
